description: Polymer web component for a to-do list application, including template, styles, and script defining behavior and properties.

classes.name: td-todos
classes.description: Polymer element implementing a to-do list interface with filtering and item management.

methods.name: attached
methods.description: Initializes the model reference when the component is attached to DOM.

methods.name: _computeLinkClass
methods.description: Computes CSS class for filter links based on current route.

methods.name: _computeAnyCompleted
methods.description: Determines if any to-do items are completed.

methods.name: _computeActiveCount
methods.description: Calculates the number of active (not completed) items.

methods.name: _computeAllCompleted
methods.description: Checks if all items are marked as completed.

methods.name: _computeItemsLeft
methods.description: Returns 'item' or 'items' based on remaining count for display.

methods.name: matchesFilter
methods.description: Returns a filter function for items based on current route.

methods.name: addTodoAction
methods.description: Adds a new to-do item using input value.

methods.name: cancelAddTodoAction
methods.description: Clears the input field for new to-do.

methods.name: toggleAllCompletedAction
methods.description: Marks all items as completed or not based on checkbox.
